name: sap.watt.common.service.ui.WizardPart
description: The WizardPart interface is a base interface for all the visual wizard components, such as wizard steps.

styles.description: The styles configuration object is used for adding a style sheet to a wizard part.

getContent.description: Creates and returns the SAPUI5 control displaying the relevant wizard part (as sap.watt.uitools.plugin.template.ui.wizard.WizardStep).

returns.description: An SAPUI5 control that displays a relevant wizard part, such as sap.watt.uitools.plugin.template.ui.wizard.WizardStep.
